org.aludratest.junit

Class AludraTestJUnitSuite

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.runner.Runner
      • org.aludratest.junit.AludraTestJUnitSuite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RunnerListener, org.junit.runner.Describable

    public class AludraTestJUnitSuite
extends org.junit.runner.Runner
implements RunnerListener
    JUnit Runner which creates a JUnit test suite structure based on AludraTest files. The related AludraTest base suite is specified using a virtual machine parameter 'suite' with a fully qualified class name, e.g. -Dsuite=com.foo.MyTest
    Author:
    Volker Bergmann

      • finishedTestLeaf

        public void finishedTestLeaf(RunnerLeaf runnerLeaf)
        Description copied from interface: RunnerListener
        Calles when the given test case has finished execution. This is also called if some or all steps of the test case failed, or the test case is ignored.
        Specified by:

      • newTestStepGroup

        public void newTestStepGroup(RunnerLeaf runnerLeaf,
                             String groupName)
        Description copied from interface: RunnerListener
        Called when a new test step group within the given test case node starts. Note that there is no matching "endTestStepGroup"; every following test step is intended to be assigned to the currently open test step group for the given test case.
        Specified by:
        newTestStepGroup in interface RunnerListener
        Parameters:
        runnerLeaf - RunnerLeaf encapsulating the test step for which a new test step group shall be opened.
        groupName - Name of the group to start.

      • newTestStep

        public void newTestStep(RunnerLeaf runnerLeaf,
                        TestStepInfo testStepInfo)
        Description copied from interface: RunnerListener
        Called when a single test step within a test case has been performed. This is the smallest traceable unit within AludraTest. The step should be assigned to the last test step group started for the given RunnerLeaf. If there is no test step group active, it is OK to throw an IllegalStateException.
        Specified by:
        newTestStep in interface RunnerListener
        Parameters:
        runnerLeaf - RunnerLeaf to which to assign the given test step.
        testStepInfo - Information about the test step.
